org.apache.avalon.phoenix.interfaces
Interface DeployerMBean

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultDeployer
public interface DeployerMBean

MBean Interface for the Deployer to use the deploy feature in the HmtlAdaptor

Author:
Joerg Bauer
